00191       // Write here the action to associate with each USB host event.
00192       // Be careful not to waste time in order not to disturb the functions.
00193 #define Usb_id_transition_action()
00194 #define Host_device_disconnection_action()
00195 #define Host_device_connection_action()
00196 #define Host_sof_action()
00197 #define Host_suspend_action()
00198 #define Host_hwup_action()
00199 #define Host_device_supported_action()
00200 #define Host_device_not_supported_action()
00201 #define Host_new_device_connection_action()
00202 #define Host_device_class_not_supported_action()
00203 #define Host_device_error_action()
00205 
00206 extern void host_sof_action(void);
00207 extern void host_suspend_action(void);
